mapper.update:
UPDATE OM_POSITION
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_org = #{guid_org,jdbcType=varchar},
position_code = #{position_code,jdbcType=varchar},
position_name = #{position_name,jdbcType=varchar},
position_type = #{position_type,jdbcType=varchar},
position_status = #{position_status,jdbcType=varchar},
isleaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=char},
sub_count = #{sub_count,jdbcType=decimal},
position_level = #{position_level,jdbcType=decimal},
position_seq = #{position_seq,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_parents = #{guid_parents,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_duty = #{guid_duty,jdbcType=varchar},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=timestamp},
lastupdate = #{lastupdate,jdbcType=date},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=varchar},
start_date = #{start_date,jdbcType=date},
end_date = #{end_date,jdbcType=date}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
